safetyPage.tagline: Your safety is our top priority.
safetyPage.title: Safety Features Designed to Exceed Expectations
safetyPage.description: We're excited to introduce our SOS feature, launching in phases. First, you'll experience the MVP version as part of our Safety Kit in the app. When you're on a trip, simply tap the SOS button to activate it. Here's what happens next:
safetyPage.benefitsTitle: Discover the benefits of our SOS feature when it's activated!
safetyPage.benefit1: Every SMS message sent will contain the precise, real-time location of the driver, ensuring that recipients can track their whereabouts accurately.
safetyPage.benefit2: Nearby drivers, within a 5KM range, will get an SMS notification.
safetyPage.benefit3: As soon as the driver adds emergency contacts, each one will instantly receive a text message, ensuring they are promptly informed and ready to assist.
safetyPage.benefit4: When the SOS feature is activated, the Efoyy team will try to reach the driver. If they can't connect, the app will:
safetyPage.benefit4Item1: Send the driver's location via SMS every 30 seconds.
safetyPage.benefit4Item2: Alert nearby drivers with the driver's exact location.

contactPage.title: Get in Touch
contactPage.description: Have questions about our safety features or need assistance? We're here to help. Reach out to our team using any of the methods below.

stories.title: Driver Success Stories
stories.description: Hear from drivers who have transformed their lives with Efoyy.

testimonials.name: Michael T.
testimonials.quote: I started driving part-time and now I'm making more than I did at my office job. The flexibility allows me to be there for my family while earning a great income.

testimonials.name: Sarah J.
testimonials.quote: As a student, Efoyy gives me the perfect way to earn money between classes. I can work when I want and focus on my studies when needed.

testimonials.name: David R.
testimonials.quote: After losing my job during the pandemic, Efoyy became my lifeline. Three years later, I'm still driving because I love the freedom and the income is better than any job I've had.

stories.title: What Our Riders Say
stories.description: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied riders.

testimonials.name: Emily K.
testimonials.quote: Efoyy has been a game-changer for my daily commute. The drivers are always professional, and I never wait more than a few minutes for pickup.

testimonials.name: Marcus L.
testimonials.quote: As someone who doesn't own a car, Efoyy has given me the freedom to go anywhere in the city without relying on public transportation schedules.

testimonials.name: Sophia W.
testimonials.quote: I feel safe using Efoyy, even late at night. The ability to share my trip status with friends gives me peace of mind, and the drivers are always respectful.

cta.title: Ready to Ride with Us?
cta.description: Download the app now and experience the convenience of Efoyy.
